titles.title: Flexible Spending Accounts Growth and Opportunities Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow amounts in a health flexible spending arrangement that are unused during a plan year to be carried over to the next plan year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/2007--Introduced. Flexible Spending Accounts Growth and Opportunities Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the carryover of up to $1,000 of unused health benefits in a health flexible spending arrangement to the next plan year of such spending arrangement.
